revision.comment: Created page with "{{Infobox dungeon |name = Courageous Cavern |image = [[File:Courageous Cavern.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Courageous Cavern. |tokens = 1,730,000 |location = North of Armor Station }} '''Courageous Cavern''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Galar]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 6x6 in size, respectively; including 16 chest tiles, 38 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 26,704,124 H..."
